Revolution Game - hw3-Wight
Developed by Ethan Wight

Supports 3×3, 3×4, and 4×4 grids

New Feature: Surrender mode allows you to view the solution by undoing the scrambling moves.
Move undone. %d moves remaining to solution.
Are you sure you want to exit?
Invalid tile. Click a rotation button or select a new anchor.
Select a tile that can be the top-left of a 2x2 subgrid.
Please select a 2x2 subgrid to rotate first.

Give up and see the solution? You can:

• Step through the solution one undo at a time
• Reveal the full solution immediately

This will enable surrender mode, allowing you to undo moves back through the scrambling sequence.
Surrender mode enabled. You can now undo %d moves to reach the solution.
